DOC.brief_summary: Camel milk new modality treatment chronic hepatitis C. The purpose study evaluate effectiveness safety camel milk combination Peginterferon Alfa-2a Ribavirin genotype 2,3 chronic hepatitis C virus .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Camel Milk Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator enrol 40 patient study . Group 1 ( Intervention ) : receive PEGASYS ( Peginterferon ) One subcutaneous injection contain 0.5 ml solution with180 mcg per week plus COPEGUS ( Ribavirin ) tablet ( body-weight adjust dose : < 75 kg = 1000 mg ≥ 75 kg = 1200 mg ) take orally ( mouth ) daily 250 ml raw camel milk consume 10 minute orally twice daily 12 week . Group 2 ( control ) : receive PEGASYS ( Peginterferon ) One subcutaneous injection contain 0.5 ml solution with180 mcg per week plus COPEGUS ( Ribavirin ) tablet ( body-weight adjust dose : < 75 kg = 1000 mg ≥ 75 kg = 1200 mg ) take orally ( mouth ) daily 12 week . Follow period 1,2,3 month treatment . The patient visit every 4 week biochemistry lab test . The patient check quantitative HCV RNA ( Ribonucleic Acid ) first month initiation treatment assess early virologic response end study complete response rate third month treatment completion sustain response rate . The patient undetectable HCV RNA consider responder .
